articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys "Masik Pass Ski Contest-2016"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys "Masik Pass Ski Contest-2016" 
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), watched the "Masik Pass Ski Contest-2016".
					 The contest brought together the Maebongsan Team of the KPA, the Sajabong Team of Ryanggang Province, the Jangjasan Team of Jagang Province, the Kwanmobong Team of North Hamgyong Province and the Songchongang Team of South Hamgyong Province.
					
					 They competed in slalom, ski jump, giant slalom and downhill.
					
					 After being told about the contest plan and the preparedness of the skiers by Kim Il Guk, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, supreme leader Kim Jong Un watched the competition.
					
					 The slalom took place.
					
					 Skiers of every team displayed fine movements, skillfully sliding down along the course.
					
					 Kim Jong Un said that the Ski Association was founded in Korea in January, 1949 under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and acceded to the International Ski Federation in 1965, underlining the need to bring the ski event to the world level at an early date in order to prove successful in international games.
					
					 The long slalom took place amid the hot competition of skiers.
					
					 There began downhill, the climax of the skiing events.
					
					 Watching it, Kim Jong Un said that the skiing of brave players was impressive.
					
					  He said judging from the skiers' performance, he was confident that the country can surely produce world-level ski stars in the future if great efforts are channeled into improving skiing events helpful to cultivating prowess, courage and agility and comprehensively developing people's physical strength and skiing is developed on a mass scale and made an inseparable part of their daily life.
					
					 He set forth tasks to serve as guidelines for rapidly developing the nation's sports, saying that sports play a role which nothing can substitute in demonstrating the country's prestige and instilling national pride and honor into the people.
					
					 There was a prize-awarding ceremony at the end of the successful contest at which men and women skiers fully displayed their skills and indomitable will they cultivated in their day-to-day training.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae, chairman of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, conferred a trophy cup and gold medals on the players of the Maebongsan Team of the KPA, who took the first place in the contest, silvers on the players of the Sajabong Team in Ryanggang Province and bronzes to the players of the Jangjasan Team in Jagang Province.
					
					 Among the spectators were Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Su Yong, O Su Yong, Ri Yong Gil, Ri Il Hwan, Kim Yong Su, Jo Yong Won, Han Kwang Sang, Pak Jong Chon, Ma Won Chun and the chairmen of the provincial party committees and people of all social strata.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with a delegation of Koreans in Japan led by O Hyong Jin, permanent adviser to the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.

articles.title: Condolences to Russian FM
articles.content:
Condolences to Russian FM
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Tuesday sent a message of condolences to his Russian counterpart Sergei Viktorovich Lavrov as regards the sudden death of Andrei Gennadiyevich Karlov, Russian ambassador to Turkey, due to a terrorist attack.
					 The message expressed deep sympathy and condolences to the Russian foreign minister and the bereaved family of the deceased.
					
					 It said that Karlov made a great contribution to developing the Russia-DPRK relations while working as Russian ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 Reiterating the stand of the DPRK's government against all forms of terrorism, violence and extremism, the message sincerely hoped that the sorrow of the bereaved family would be assuaged as early as possible.

articles.title: Vietnamese Army Day Marked
articles.content:
Vietnamese Army Day Marked
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Pham Viet Hung and Military Attache Nguyen Quoc Viet of the Vietnamese embassy here gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club Tuesday to mark the army day of Vietnam.
					 Present there on invitation were O Kum Chol, deputy chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army (KPA), generals and other officers of the KPA, officials concerned and representatives and military attaches of embassies of different countries here.

articles.title: Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Birthday Spread to Centenarian 
 Myongchon, December 20 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea sent a centenarian birthday spread to Ra Yon Hae, a woman living in Kocham-ri, Myongchon County of North Hamgyong Province.
					 Ra was born in Onchon-ri, Kilju County of North Hamgyong Province on December 20, Juche 5 (1916) and experienced bitter sorrow of being a member of the ruined nation under the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule. 
					
					 It was after Korea's liberation by President Kim Il Sung that she could lead a genuine life. She had worked hard as an agricultural worker with the will to contribute to the building of a prosperous country with increased grain production.
					
					 Even after her retirement for age, she has continued to work, always living in an optimistic way and having balanced diet.

articles.title: DPRK Permanent Representative's Letter Distributed as Official Document of UN
articles.content:
DPRK Permanent Representative's Letter Distributed as Official Document of UN
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- A letter to the UN secretary general, sent by the DPRK permanent representative to the UN, was distributed as A/71/672-S/2016/1042, an official document of the UN General Assembly and the UN Security Council, on Dec. 17.
					 The letter demanded the clarification of the legal ground for the UNSC to adopt "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK.

articles.title: Delegations of Koreans in China Leave
articles.content:
Delegations of Koreans in China Leave
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Association of Korean Business Persons in China led by Chairman Phyo Song Ryong and a delegation of the Association for Economic and Cultural Exchange of Korean Nationality in Dandong City of China headed by Chairman Kim Thaek Ryong left here on Tuesday.

articles.title: Successes Made in Preserving Characters of Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia
articles.content:
Successes Made in Preserving Characters of Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia 
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Research Institute of the DPRK has made signal successes in the research on preserving characters of immoral flowers Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia.
					 Researchers of the institute have provided a scientific foundation for preserving the characters of Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia and propagating them by means of culturing their growing points.
					
					 They also settled sci-tech problems arising in the research on botanical chemicals made with locally available materials, introduction of vegetable activator and water-purifying agent and others for the cultivation of the immortal flowers.

articles.title: Advantageous Social Insurance System in DPRK
articles.content:
Advantageous Social Insurance System in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Thanks to the people-oriented policies of the Workers' Party of Korea and the government, all the working people in the DPRK are leading a stable life, being provided with relaxation and keeping their health under the universal, free medical care and social insurance systems at the state cost.
					 The benefits from the social insurance system are fully guaranteed by law.
					
					 In his concluding speech "On Enforcing the Law on Social Insurance" made at the session of the Presidium of the Provisional People's Committee of North Korea in December Juche 35 (1946), President Kim Il Sung underscored the need to adopt the law on social insurance for improving health of workers, office workers and their families and stabilizing their livelihood.
					
					 The social insurance system includes the system of paying temporary allowance based on the length of service to workers and office workers unable to work due to illness, wound and nursing assignments for their family members, the maternity allowance system and the recuperation and relaxation system.
					
					 In recent years, the Yonphung Scientists Holiday Camp and the holiday home for farmers in Tongrim County were completed to meet the requirements of a highly civilized socialist nation. And many other holiday homes like the Ryongwon Mine Holiday Home and sanatoriums have been built or rebuilt at industrial establishments.
					
					 The DPRK government has steadily increased the state budgetary allocation to social insurance in keeping with the developing national economic power.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Ridicules Hysteric Actions of S. Korean Military
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Ridicules Hysteric Actions of S. Korean Military 
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers are going ever more crazy with arms build-up in a bid to escalate confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					 The south Korean puppet military purchased German-made air-to-ground missile Taurus while talking about the "precision attack on Pyongyang" in the wake of introduction of a U.S. nuclear submarine. 
					
					 They are nothing but hysteric actions to get rid of extreme uneasiness caused by the ruinous situation at home and the reckless confrontation racket to seek a way out in escalating the tension.
					
					 The candlelight actions to judge Park Geun Hye now sweeping across south Korea are getting fiercer day by day to make a clean sweep of all traitors engrossed in sycophancy and acts of treachery, confrontation with compatriots and unpopular rule.
					
					 The south Korean military is seized with uneasiness and fear, foreseeing the tragic end of Park Geun Hye more dead than alive.
					
					 The puppet warmongers took the lead in selling off the nation's interests as evidenced by their acts of pushing the inter-Korean relations to the worst confrontational phase and leaving OPECON to the tender mercy of outside forces for an indefinite period at the instructions of Park, marionette of a shaman.
					
					 Much upset by the angered public pushing the Park group to the court of history hour by hour, the puppet military is working hard to seek a way out in escalating the tension at the instigation of its master.
					
					 Even in the grip of the worst crisis caused by the hideous scandal, the puppet military rapidly concluded an agreement on protecting military intelligence with Japan, the sworn enemy, and is working hard to conclude an agreement on logistic support with Japan.
					
					 Despite strong opposition to the THAAD deployment at home and abroad and the serious consequences to be entailed by it, the warmongers announced that they would complete it before May next year as demanded by their American master.
					
					 Meanwhile, they are staging ceaseless anti-DPRK war drills aimed at deliberately creating "security crisis" and "security unrest" in a bid to divert the public criticism elsewhere. 
					
					 No sooner had the motion on impeachment of Park passed through the "National Assembly" than brass hats of the puppet military appeared at forefront units every day to make such war drumbeats as "strong and resolute counteraction" against the DPRK's "surprise provocation".
					
					 They held one war confab after another to cry out for "establishing mental and physical readiness" and beg the U.S. to "provide increased force for monitoring the north's moves" allegedly to cope with its "possible provocation." 
					
					 At a time when its U.S. master is unable to sleep in peace for fear of the DPRK's powerful nuclear deterrent, the puppet military is getting frantic with the moves to escalate the tension and ignite a war. This reminds one of desperate wriggling of tiger moths before perishing in flames.
					
					 The warmongers would be well advised to ponder over their miserable end.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Chongwadae's Anti-DPRK War Hysteria
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Chongwadae's Anti-DPRK War Hysteria 
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities introduced a U.S. nuclear submarine into the Jinhae navy base in South Kyongsang Province and more than 40 air-to-ground Taurus missiles from Germany recently. In this regard, the south Korean warmongers vociferated about "actions for deterring the north's provocation aiming at emergency situation," "strong warning" and "precision attack on Pyongyang."
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary:
					
					 This is nothing but a hysteric action taken by the puppet authorities out of the extreme uneasiness caused by their ruinous situation and a reckless confrontation racket to seek a way out in escalating the tension.
					
					 It is the sinister intention of the south Korean ruling quarters to stem the trend of the situation, save the witch of Chongwadae from her doom and prop up the conservative regime at any cost by intensifying the war moves against the DPRK in collusion with outside forces through the noisy propaganda about "provocation."
					
					 No matter how desperately they may escalate the confrontation with the DPRK, vociferating about "provocation" in a bid to keep the regime afloat by diverting the public attention elsewhere, they can never escape the miserable fate already sealed.
					
					 The south Korean warmongers' persistent war moves against the DPRK under the absurd pretext of "provocation" would only help the people more clearly see through the despicable nature of the Park Geun Hye group which leaves no means untried to tide over the crisis and they will only give further momentum to the anti-regime actions.
					
					 They should be mindful that the above-said war moves will only precipitate their final ruin.

articles.title: U.S. Moves against DPRK Is Daydream: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Moves against DPRK Is Daydream: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- U.S. Secretary of Defense Carter at a recent meeting said the DPRK's "threat" is one of serious threats against the U.S. and that the U.S. forces would do their best to the end in coping with such provocative "threat".
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary brands his remarks as jargons of the living dead as he maliciously slandered the DPRK not only from the first days of his office but also today when he is almost serving out his office.
					
					 The commentary points out the reason why the U.S. deliberately keeps the vicious cycle of escalating tension while ceaselessly conducting the most offensive and aggressive joint military exercises only on the Korean Peninsula out of various Asia-Pacific regions and steadily increasing their frequency and scale.
					
					 It discloses that the U.S. purpose is to stifle the DPRK by steadily escalating tension on the peninsula in a cycle and push forward its Asia-Pacific rebalancing strategy for containing neighboring countries.
					
					 The U.S. moves for stifling the DPRK are little short of a daydream, the commentary says, warning:
					
					 As long as the U.S. ruling quarters get more frantic in their moves for aggression and a war against the DPRK, they will find themselves in more serious situation in which they can not ensure security on its mainland.

articles.title: S. Korea: Puppet PM Criticized for Acting as "President"
articles.content:
S. Korea: Puppet PM Criticized for Acting as "President"
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The parliamentary spokesman for the Minju Party of south Korea on Dec. 18 called a news conference to denounce the puppet prime minister for acting himself as "president", according to south Korean KBS.
					 Saying "Prime Minister" Hwang Kyo An should behave himself, the spokesman urged him to stop at once his attempt to enforce all sorts of sycophantic and traitorous policies such as the deployment of THAAD and the "agreement" on the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army which failed to win the sympathy of the people.

articles.title: Disclosure of Findings on Pollution in U.S. Military Base Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Disclosure of Findings on Pollution in U.S. Military Base Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The People's Solidarity for Revising Unequal SOFA in south Korea  on Dec. 16 prompted the puppet Ministry of Environment to open the findings on pollution level in a U.S. military base, according to an online newspaper Tongil News.
					 The Bar Association for Democratic Society filed a suit against the minister of Environment who declined to open the findings, while making an excuse that if the findings are opened, it would impede the diplomatic performance with the U.S.
					
					 In a commentary the People's Solidarity condemned the puppet Ministry of Environment for having refused to disclose the findings despite the court's ruling.

articles.title: S. Korea: Ministry of Education Censured for "State-compiled History Textbooks"
articles.content:
S. Korea: Ministry of Education Censured for "State-compiled History Textbooks"
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The Council of Superintendents of Education in south Korea, consisting of 17 city and provincial superintendents of education, held an emergency meeting for checking the introduction of "state-compiled history textbooks" at Seoul Railway Station on Dec. 17, according to the south Korean newspaper Hangyore.
					 In a statement the organization denounced the minister of Education for persisting in the "system of introducing state-compiled history textbooks", one of wrong policies of Park Geun Hye.
					
					 And it demanded an immediate stop to the "introduction of state-compiled history textbooks" and the prompt resignation of the minister of Education and other "government" officials who took the lead in the "introduction". 
					
					 The organization said that an immediate stop to the wrong policies and the repeal of all of them are a shortcut to setting right the chaotic situation.

articles.title: U.S. Forces in S. Korea under Fire for Contaminating Underground Water
articles.content:
U.S. Forces in S. Korea under Fire for Contaminating Underground Water
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that underground water around the U.S. military base in Ryongsan, Seoul was contaminated with poisonous substance exceeding 500 times than the tolerable limit, according to the south Korean MBC on Monday.
					 After a survey was made of underground water in two places near the military base, poisonous substance extremely harmful to human beings was found to surpass the tolerable limit 587 times and 512 times. 
					
					 In this regard, the Seoul City side urged the Ministry of Environment to make public the results of the survey of the military base, warning that contaminated underground water would continue to leak unless the polluted area in the U.S. military base is purified.

articles.title: CBS Blames Park Geun Hye for Evading Her Responsibility for Scandal
articles.content:
CBS Blames Park Geun Hye for Evading Her Responsibility for Scandal
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean CBS Sunday denounced Park Geun Hye for evading her responsibility for the extra-large scandal.
					 The broadcasting service disclosed that Park in her written answer given to the "constitutional court" feigned ignorance of the suspicion about fund-raising amounting to tens of billions of won  by Mir Foundation and denied every charge against her such as bribery, power abuse and leak of secrets.

articles.title: Bird Flu Sweeps S. Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Sweeps S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Bird flu reportedly spreads like wildfire across south Korea, causing great concern.
					 On Dec. 17 alone, bird flu attacked 11 areas including Phongtaek and Ansong in Kyonggi Province and Chonan in South Chungcheong Province.
					
					 Poultry farms in over 180 places were ravaged by bird flu, the worst damage of its kind.

articles.title: Bird Flu Occurs at Zoo in Seoul
articles.content:
Bird Flu Occurs at Zoo in Seoul
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Two storks were found dead at a zoo in Seoul on December 16 and 17, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 They were infected with bird flu.
					
					 This is the first time that bird flu occurred at a zoo in south Korea.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Newspapers and websites of different countries gave special write-ups to the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Nepalese newspaper Arpan on Dec. 9 carried an article titled "Eternal leader of Korean people," illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It lauded the feats of Kim Jong Il who developed in depth the Juche idea, the Songun idea fathered by President Kim Il Sung so that the Korean people could keep to the road of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 On the same day the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics and the Nepal-Korea Friendship Association posted similar articles on their websites.
					
					 An Indonesian online newspaper on Dec. 6 stressed in an article that Kim Jong Il is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people, adding: His ideas and theories serve as an eternal banner of illumining the way of struggle to be followed by the Korean people advancing toward socialism
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper the Daily Folk on Dec. 8 carried an article titled "Kim Jong Il, world-famous outstanding leader", which quoted what prominent personages of different countries have said, deeply moved by his noble personality.
					
					 The Indian paper Awaking on Dec. 9 carried an article under the title of "Ushering in a new era of independent reunification" which praised Kim Jong Il's feats.
					
					 Another Indian paper New Delhi Times on Dec. 2 ran an article dealing with the self-development capability, an ever-victorious treasured sword of the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Works Introduced in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Works Introduced in Peru
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The Peru-Korea Institute of Culture and Friendship posted President Kim Il Sung's works on its website on Dec. 8.
					 The works are "3. Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully" from "Report to the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee" and "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country".
					
					 The work "3. Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully" from "Report to the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee", published on October 10, Juche 69 (1980), refers to the struggle conducted by the Workers' Party of Korea to achieve the national reunification in the period under review and the tasks for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 It also clarifies a new reunification proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK) on the basis of the three principles of national reunification and the 10-point policy to be enforced by the DFRK.
					
					 The work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country", published on April 6, Juche 82 (1993), comprehensively indicates the ways for realizing the great national unity such as the need for all Koreans to found a reunified state in unity and the issues of achieving unity on the basis of patriotism and the spirit of national independence and promoting co-existence, co-prosperity and common interests and stopping all partisan disputes fanning up split and confrontation among compatriots, the necessity for the north and the south to trust and get united with each other and issues of not rejecting people because of different isms but joining hands on the road of national reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia Torneo de Esqui Masikryong â€“ 2016
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia Torneo de Esqui Masikryong - 2016
Pyongyang, 20 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio el Torneo de Esqui Masikryong de 2016.
					En la cita deportiva, realizada dividiendose en las modalidades de eslalon, salto, eslalon gigante y descenso, compitieron el equipo Maebongsan del EPC, el Sajabong de la provincia de Ryanggang, el Jangjasan de la provincia de Jagang, el Kwanmobong de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte y el Songchongang de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente escucho el parte del ministro de Deportes Kim Il Guk sobre el plan de la marcha del torneo y la preparacion de los jugadores y vio el torneo.
					
					Tuvo lugar primero la competencia de eslalon.
					
					Los jugadores de cada equipo mostraron los movimientos excelentes dando vueltas a los postes colocados densamente.
					
					Kim Jong Un recordo que bajo la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, se fundo en Corea la Asociacion de Esqui en enero de 1949 y nuestro pais se afilio en 1965 a la Federacion Internacional de Esqui.
					
					Destaco la necesidad de desarrollar cuanto antes en el nivel mundial la disciplina de esqui para ganar en los juegos internacionales.
					
					El eslalon gigante tambien tuvo lugar con mucha competitividad.
					
					Acto seguido, se efectuo el descenso que llevo al climax el torneo.
					
					Mirando el deslizamiento explosivo, dijo que le impresionan mucho los esquiadores valientes.
					
					Al ver esta competencia, tuve la seguridad de que apareceran en nuestro pais los esquiadores de talla mundial si prestan mucha atencion a ese deporte, que cultiva la audacia, valentia y agilidad y desarrolla generalmente la constitucion fisica, y lo practican de manera masiva y cotidiana, apunto.
					
					Senalando que el deporte desempena el papel insustituible en dignificar la patria e infundir en el pueblo el orgullo nacional, indico las tareas que serviran de guia para desarrollar trascendentalmente el deporte nacional.
					
					Hubo la ceremonia de premiacion luego de terminado con exito el torneo en que los jugadores de ambos sexos demostraron plenamente su tecnica adiestrada en los entrenamientos rutinarios e incomparable denuedo.
					
					El presidente del Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes, Choe Ryong Hae, otorgo la copa y medallas de oro al equipo Maebongsan y las preseas de plata y bronce a los equipos Sajabong y Jangjasan, respectivamente.
					
					Entre los espectadores figuraban tambien Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Su Yong, O Su Yong, Ri Yong Gil, Ri Il Hwan, Kim Yong Su, Jo Yong Won, Han Kwang Sang, Pak Jong Chon, Ma Won Chun, y los presidentes de los comites del PTC en las provincias y la multitud de diferentes sectores.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia alimentos de cumpleanos a Ra Yon Hae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia alimentos de cumpleanos a Ra Yon Hae
Pyongyang, 20 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio a la anciana Ra Yon Hae, quien vive en la unidad de vecinos No.1 de la comuna de Kocham del distrito de Myongchon de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, los alimentos de fiesta para su centesimo cumpleanos.
					La longeva centenaria nacio el 20 de diciembre del 5 (1916) de la Era Juche en la comuna de Onchon del distrito de Kilju de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte y experimento en carne propia las desgracias de la nacion apatrida bajo la dominacion colonial del imperialismo japones sobre Corea. 
					
					Despues de la liberacion de la patria por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, comenzo a llevar una vida digna y trabajo con abnegacion cumpliendo su deber de trabajadora agricola con el deseo de contribuir a la construccion de patria prospera mediante el aumento de produccion de cereales. 
					
					Despues de ser jubilada, no dejo de trabajar y vive con optimismo manteniendo una dieta equilibrada. 
					
					Encomienda a sus descendientes que trabajen mucho mas por el grato regimen socialista.

articles.title: Distribuida carta de representante coreano como documento oficial de la ONU
articles.content:
Distribuida carta de representante coreano como documento oficial de la ONU
Pyongyang, 20 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Quedo distribuida el dia 17 como documento oficial A/71/672-S/2016/1042 de la Asamblea General y el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU la carta del representante permanente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ante la ONU, enviada al secretario general de la ONU para exigirle la aclaracion del fundamento juridico de la "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
